films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
films.description: Aliens resurrect dead humans as zombies and vampires to stop humanity from creating a doomsday weapon.

films.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians
films.description: Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

films.title: Robot Monster
films.description: A robot monster (with the body of a gorilla and the head of a fishbowl) has killed all but six people on Earth.
